long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Improve your RateMyProfessors experience with more accurate and fair professor ratings! This extension removes artificial curves and recalculates percentages to provide a more honest representation of professor scores.

Note: Due to Manifest V3 compliance requirements, some compromises were necessary in the extension's functionality. You may need to refresh pages you've previously visited in order to see the updated, honest statistics.
